subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The Jamaican sprinter Usain Bolt won a record-tying third athlete of the year award from the International Association of Athletics Federations despite losing his hold on the 100 meters in 2011.
snippet: The Jamaican sprinter Usain Bolt won a record-tying third athlete of the year award from the International Association of Athletics Federations despite losing his hold on the 100 meters in 2011.
